job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Partnerships
job.description: Our mission at OpenAI is to discover and enact the path to safe beneficial AGI To do this we believe that many technical breakthroughs are needed in generative modeling reinforcement learning large scale optimization active learning among other topicsbrbrOur mission at OpenAI is to discover and enact the path to safe beneficial AGI To do this we believe that many technical breakthroughs are needed in generative modeling reinforcement learning large scale optimization and active learning  among other topicsbrbrThe OpenAI Applied AI Research team acts as a bridge between the research organization and our customers By working on real world use cases we learn what our technology is capable of today and which research areas might be interesting to focus our research efforts in for the futurebrbrWere looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to work directly with close partners and large enterprise customers to make them successful with OpenAIs technology Youll help customers with solution design and implementation detailsbrbrAs a Machine Learning Engineer on the Applied AI Research team you should be able tobrul liTake our latest AI technology and integrate it into our partners solutionsli liPartner with sales product and engineering teams to design solutions for strategic partnershipsli liLead the technical design and implementation of the API on partners internal infrastructureli liServe as the chief technical consultant for customers during their integrationli liOwn and drive relationships with external technical audiences of all kinds  from an engineer to the CTO  to understand business objectives and translate requirements into solutionsli liWork on solutionsoriented engineering and research problemsli liDevelop integration support material and documentation for new products and featuresli liContribute to our enterprise strategyli brulThis role may be a good fit for you if youbrul liEnjoy working directly with customers and solving their problemsli liOpening up the boundaries on practical AI technologiesli liThrive in driving ambiguity towards clarityli liLike collaborating across teams and functionsli liEnjoy running experiments in a rigorous wayli brbrulstrongWere Looking For a Blend Ofbrstrongul liConsulting or solution architect experienceli liMachine learning experienceli liSoftware engineering experienceli liProblem solving abilityli liExcellent communication skills to any audienceli brbrulstrongAbout OpenAIbrbrstrongWere building safe Artificial General Intelligence AGI and ensuring it leads to a good outcome for humans We believe that unreasonably great results are best delivered by a highly creative group working in concert We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusbrbrThis position is subject to a background check for any convictions directly related to its duties and responsibilities Only jobrelated convictions will be considered and will not automatically disqualify the candidate Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsbrbrWe will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process to perform essential job functions and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment Please contact us to request accommodations via accommodationopenaicombrbrstrongBenefitsbrstrongul liHealth dental and vision insurance for you and your familyli liUnlimited time off we encourage 4 weeks per yearli liParental
